name: Arthurian Name Generator
description: Unleash your inner knight! Discover your legendary Arthurian name and embark on a quest for glory (or at least a really cool nickname).
introduction: Ever wondered what Sir Lancelot would call *you*?  Or maybe you're destined to be a sorceress even Merlin would envy?  Our Arthurian Name Generator conjures up names fit for royalty, rogues, and round table regulars alike.  Prepare to be knighted... with a brand new, totally awesome name!
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button. It's easier than pulling a sword from a stone (and way less likely to give you a backache).
Keep clicking! Arthurian legends are vast, so experiment until you find a name that resonates with your noble (or not-so-noble) spirit.
Share your legendary name with the world!  Brag to your friends, update your social media, and maybe even start a jousting club (helmets sold separately).
Feeling extra creative? Mix and match prefixes and suffixes for truly unique Arthurian flair. Go wild, my friend!

faqs.question: Is this name generator actually based on real Arthurian names?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We've delved into the depths of Arthurian lore, from Malory's *Morte d'Arthur* to more obscure texts, to bring you a blend of authentic and inspired names.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my fantasy characters?
faqs.answer: Of course! These names are perfect for characters in your novels, games, or even just for a bit of imaginative role-playing.  Go forth and create!

faqs.question: What if I don't like the name I get?
faqs.answer: No problem! Just hit that 'Generate' button again. We've got more names than Camelot has cobblestones. You're bound to find one you love.

faqs.question: Are the names gender-specific?
faqs.answer: While some names have historical gender associations, feel free to interpret them as you wish!  Arthurian legend is all about breaking boundaries.

faqs.question: Will this generator tell me if I'm destined to find the Holy Grail?
faqs.answer: Sadly, no. This generator specializes in names, not prophecy. But hey, with a cool Arthurian name, you're already one step closer to adventure!

faqs.question: Can I use the generated names for commercial purposes?
faqs.answer: While the names themselves are generally fair game, we encourage you to do your own research to ensure that any specific combination isn't already trademarked or copyrighted. Be creative and responsible!
